detail_desc: Fitted, short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey, designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

prod_name: Mini Me LOGG Bixa dress LOGG
detail_desc: Wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Shirt in soft, patterned narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in woven fabric with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Non-wired bra in lace with moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with flutter sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist with decorative gathers.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Straight-cut, knee-length dress in pima cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke front and back. Short sleeves, flap chest pockets, flap front pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with visible seams. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs and a cut-off hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sun hat in an airy, patterned cotton weave with a brim at the front, covered elastication and a decorative bow at the back, and ties under the chin. Lined. Width of brim 5 cm.
Short top in jacquard-knit jersey with a sheen, with a wide neckline and short sleeves.
Shorts in washed, stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and raw-edge frayed hems.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a crocheted lace trim at the hem.
Vest top in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.

Baby Exclusive. Romper suit in an airy organic cotton weave with a yoke, short, frilled sleeves, buttons down the front and elasticated hems. Concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y).
Tops in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Pool shoes in scuba fabric with a hook and loop fastening at the front (sizes 7-9 also with an elasticated heel strap). Fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine cotton knit containing some cashmere. High, ribbed collar with a zip at the top, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and cuffed hems.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Short, wide top in soft, printed jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

Suit trousers woven in a linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, diagonal side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Pull-on trousers in a soft weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.

Round sunglasses with plastic frames, sidepieces and lenses. The lenses are UV-protective, tinted and polarised. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare.
Sports top in heavy jersey with taped details. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, short sleeves with ventilation holes under the arms, a kangaroo pocket, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fully lined, padded bikini top with gathers at the front, overlocked frill trims and side support. Ties at the back and detachable straps that tie at the back of the neck.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a slight sheen. High waist with an extended waist band and metal buttons, a zip fly, side pockets and legs with creases.
Plastic hair claw. Width 4.5 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow, frilled shoulder straps and frill trimmed hems.
Elasticated scrunchies in woven fabric with a decorative bow.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim 9 cm.
Protective plastic case with a lid for AirPods.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details and a raw-edge frayed hem.
Sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline and press-studs at the crotch.
Suede trainers with a padded top edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a wide raw-edge neckline, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket shorts in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative drawstring, fake fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and smocked back. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Long knitted jumper in a soft alpaca and wool blend with a wrapover polo neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves that taper to the cuffs. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a sheen. Decorative metal buttons on the shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.
Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Oversized cardigan in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a V-neck, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and extra-long sleeves. Ribbing down the button band and around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Elastic hairband with decorative fabric flowers.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, and discreet pockets in the side seams.
Scarf in a soft, fine knit with fringes on the short sides.

Softshell jacket in waterproof functional fabric with folded seams, a high stand-up collar and hood. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gently rounded hem, slightly longer at the back. Brushed thermal inside. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.

Set with a top, shorts and hat. Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, short butterfly sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Puff shorts and sun hat in an airy, patterned cotton weave. Shorts with elastication at the waist and hems. Hat with ties under the chin. Lined.
Fancy dress costume in soft pile with a hood and appliqués. Zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.

Blouse in airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a bib front with pin-tucks and a small, gathered frill around the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a detachable tie belt below the bust.

Chinos in soft washed cotton twill with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, waffle-knit cotton with a zip-up chest pocket in contrasting colour woven fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with frill trims. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt in woven fabric with a scalloped edge and broderie anglaise at the hem. Jersey-lined skirt.
Short T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with frill trims.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
3/4-length trousers in patent jersey. High waist with pleats at the front and shaping darts at the back, a zip fly and button, and diagonal side pockets. Relaxed fit.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Zip fly and concealed button, side pockets and tapered legs.
Polo-neck jumper in fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fitted, sleeveless body in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and press-studs at the crotch.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Pyjamas with a long-sleeved shirt and pair of bottoms in soft jersey. Shirt with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, straight legs.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, wide jersey top with short sleeves and a low-cut, wrapover back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck.
Lace push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Dress in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with shoulder straps that have a woven broderie anglaise frill trim. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Ankle-length cargo trousers in washed, stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flap leg pockets with buttons.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a zip down the front and along one leg, long sleeves and full feet.

Cropped, sleeveless top in a patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck front and back, and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Flounces at the top that continue over the shoulders, narrow ties at the back to keep the top in place, and wide ties at the hem.
Jumper in a soft fine knit with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.

Bandeau bikini top with a knot detail at the front, lined, lightly padded cups and side support. Detachable, adjustable straps that fasten at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal hook fastening at the back.
